purpose: The email announces the accepted workshops for the 41st International Conference on Logic Programming (ICLP 2025), which will take place at the University of Calabria, Rende, Italy, from September 12 to September 19, 2025. It provides a list of eight workshops that will be co-located with the conference, along with brief descriptions and links to their respective websites. The workshops cover a variety of topics related to logic programming and are open for paper submissions.
evidence_sentences: ICLP 2025, the 41st International Conference on Logic Programming, will be held at the University of Calabria, Rende, Italy, from September 12 to September 19, 2025.
This year, we are pleased to announce that eight workshops will be co-located with ICLP 2025.
Below is the list of the accepted workshops, along with short descriptions and links to their respective websites.
The calls for paper submission are open.
